document_data.name: Amaratha Stream
document_data.mainbody: The '''Amaratha Stream''' was a flowing body of water found in the grassy steppes of [[the Ride]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}
document_data.Geography: The stream flowed south from the [[White Peaks]] and wound southwest for miles before ending at a point just east of the [[Rogan's Sprint]] trail.
document_data.Etymology: [[Amaratha]]s were a variety of light green [[jewel]]s unique to [[Faer√ªn]].
